version_description:
What we've learned through years is that it's never too early for your Christmas preparations. So hopefully, you'll be happy to find five new holiday effects and use them to create perfect greeting cards.
- "Snowflake Lace" and "Warm Holiday Wishes" in the "Simple Frames" group
- "Magic Moments" in "Amazing Frames"
- HO-HO-HO is a face montage with Santa hat (quite predictable, huh?)
- "Princess Crown Masquerade Mask" has been added to the "Face Props" collection.

In case you don't want to let Christmas in your life just yet, head to the Face Props for the fashion hit - "Blind for Love" glasses!

- "Happy Days" are here again and here to stay with new style in "Masterpiece".
- Eat, Pray, Love and "No Sleep". The new adorable mask is already in "Face Props". B-)
- Is it snowing where you are? No? Then beautiful snowflakes are what your photo needs badly! Apply the effect in "Smart Filters".
- There are also two Christmas effects, but we are keeping silence and trust you with finding them by yourselves. :P
Time to get everything Christmas in one devoted tab! Follow the evergreen tree icon and let the Holiday magic begin in your photos!

Hurray! Photo Lab became one of the coolest in Facial Transformations and Machine Learning in several countries according to Apple and also picked the trophy as the hottest app in Russia according to Google Play. As a sign of our gratitude we’ve made this update really thrilling.

You will smile and cry at the same time, explore new galaxies and turn into awesome characters. Excited? Check out ‘Face in Hole Effects’!

Pixel and meme fans will love the surprise from ‘Face Photo Props’! Deal with it :)

And to make your combos even more stylish we’ve added a new template to ‘Photo Borders’.

Hurray! Photo Lab became one of the coolest in Facial Transformations and Machine Learning in several countries according to Apple and also picked the trophy as the best app of 2017 according to Google Play. As a sign of our gratitude we’ve made this update really thrilling. Update and Enjoy! ;)
Non-stop Christmas photo fun! 300+ effects and combos for a perfect Season's Greetings and Holiday selfie transformations.

Guess who’s coming to town? Holiday spirit is so here with a bunch of new effects from Photo Lab!

How many new festive templates can you find in this update? We are doing our best to bring you joy, so share the holiday spirit through your combos, greeting cards and new avatars!

Don’t forget to check out ‘Face in Holes Effects’! The new effects will make your portrait photos sing the favorite Christmas songs!

Update now for a Ho, Ho, HOLY good time.

How many new festive templates can you find in this update? We are doing our best to bring you joy, so share the holiday spirit through your combos, greeting cards and new avatars!

Don’t forget to check out ‘Face in Holes Effects’! The new effects will make your portrait photos sing the favorite Christmas songs!
Happy New Year and happy new effects!
Bug fixes and performance improvements

New arrivals!
- to play hide-and-seek in the Winter forest find "Behind the Fir Branches" effect in Face Montages;
- colorful Heart Bokeh is already available in Double Exposures (and in a variety of stunning combos too);
- for your Golden Leaf Crown head to the Headwear category

Photo Lab is getting ready to help you share your love with your sweetheart (or with the whole world, if that's your plan), so make sure to try on Love Glasses in Face Photo Props and combine them with new loveable hairstyle in Face Montages.

Smart Filters have welcomed new effect, that creates an intriguing illusion of flying faces and there is a Secret Smile face animation arrival in GIF Animations.

Some fixes and performance improvements are also included.

It's going to be a special Valentine's Day with Photo Lab!

To share your very special feelings (even for the first time) go to 'Face Photo Props' to 'Be in the Mood for Love', surprise your sweetheart with the trendy 'All About Us' template from 'Realistic Photomontage' and edit your images with the new overlay from 'Double Exposures'.

Need inspiration for new combos? Find the impressing effects in 'Color & Lighting Filters'!

Check out the long-awaited feature - hashtag search for combos in your Feed. We know you're going to love it!

Hey, look, it’s an update here!

- Don’t be shy to look starry. Try ‘Star Glasses’ in Face Photo Props to feel the summer vibes.

- Turn on "Blue Eyes" or "Red eyes"! Or would you rather try yellow? No problem - choose your color in Face Montages.

- Good news for all IG fans - get ready to find your favorite filters in newly-added 'InstaMood' category.

- You've never seen anything like this. Try brand new 'Thin line' effect in GIF maker.

- Check out Double Exposures category. 'Heart Shaped Bubbles' will definitely become this summer's hit.

- Want to add some tenderness to your photo? Apply 'Purity' Masterpiece effect.

- What's old is new again: meet 'Makeover' category! We've put all make-up and hairdo effects from different categories together, so you won't waste your time to find effects for upgrading your look.

- Deal with your fears with 'No superstitions' effect.

- Are you vampire-addicted? You'll definitely love 'Wild and bloodless', new arrival in 'Face Montages'.

It's time to try new Photo Lab effects!

- Let the football madness begin! Show your devotion to favorite team with new effects in Flags category.

- Annoyed by paparazzi? 'No photos please' is the best solution.
We don’t want to overwhelm you with technical details. All you need to know is that Photo Lab has become more reliable. Enjoy!

- Welcome to our FIFA 2018 Fanzone. Get ready to pay tribute to your favorite team.

- Feel like a superhero with 'Lazer eyes' effect.
We're 100% ready for the World Cup 2018! Check the devoted tab and prove that you are true fan of your national team!

- The football event of the year is going on! Support your national team with effects from Flags and Fan Zone and new ‘Ole-ole-ole’ effect in Face Montages.
- We need more art! Try 3 new effects in Masterpiece.
- Have you seen ‘Bang Boom Pop’? It’s a real bomb!
- All eyes are on you with ‘Retro TV wall’ effect from New Reality.

The right hair color can make it or break it, right? And Photo Lab is becoming the app where your wildest hair dreams may come true. Visit ‘Makeover’ to find new hairdos and more.

During the football event of the year there is always something for football fans in the ‘Fan Zone’! We are ready to support your team during Knockout Rounds - what about you? ;)

We can't help releasing this update as the effects in it are too good to keep it from you. Update and follow the NEW badge to be the first to apply them all.

Some improvements are also included.

One of the Photo Lab's SECRETs is that you can COMBINE any effects in the Category tab with each other & get really cool and one of a kind results. Consider it a small inspirational reminder. Especially now when NEW effects are on board! ;)

Your life will never be the same with our new Smart FX tab!

Choose a photo and get a list of the best effects other users applied to images like this. Driven by Artificial Intelligence the algorithm analyzes your photo's content, color, light balance and many more things to work this little wonder.

Made with love at Photo Lab :)

Shake up your life with our update! Use new effects to become someone’s Bird of Happiness, remember about Two Morning Necessities and learn how to Read Between the Lines. If you want to express your emotions, try on our new GIF animations – Acting Weird, Emotions Under Control and Panic Attack.

Every new update is better than the previous one!

– The “Masterpiece” category has two new effects: “Yellow Brick Road” and “Sands of Time”. Sounds like a trip spirit, yeah? ;)

– Do you feel something mysterious in the air? It's new arrivals in “Smart Filters”: “Out of the Fog” and “Greyscale”.

– Finally, our “Makeover” and “Headwear” categories were also laced with new effects. Create a new look with “Heavenly Bodies” and add a real crown by applying “Your Majesty”.

Enjoy!

Though this update is mostly about under the hood fixes, we were able to add a couple of effects to the "Makeover" group. Find two sparkling-glittering lipstick colors for even more glamorous looks.  ;)

What's on the horizon? It's our update!

Apply "Dye My Hair Emerald" in the "Makeover" category and color your day. And hair.

Want something mystical? "Spirit Rising" in "Smart Filters" and "Water Nymph" from "Face Montages" are right up your alley.

Autumn is coming. Time to apply our warm "Home Sweet Home" effect from "Masterpiece".

Thank God It's Friday! What? Not yet? It doesn't matter if you have "TGIF" in the "GIF Animations" category.

Enjoy!

Wow, new effects!

For those who love designer photo edits we are glad to offer “Pink and Teal Channel Shift" from “Smart Filters”.

What about a new eyes color? No, not one color - two, three or a real palette! Go to the “Makeover” category and apply “Rainbow Iris”.

Boo! Halloween is closer and closer… And we are starting to prepare for it! Apply our new “Boootiful Halloween” in “Simple Frames” or turn into a real “Symbiont” in “Face Montages” (be careful: it's sooo frightful!).

Shh, don't scare off our new update...

Show everyone your blue blood – apply “Royal Tears” in “GIF Animations”.

The "Art Backgrounds" category has a new effect for the first time in a while – meet the warm "Pastel Fantasy" background.

One more Halloween frame is already in "Amazing Photo Frames". Check it out!

Shh, don't scare off our new update...

Show everyone your blue blood – apply “Royal Tears” in “GIF Animations”.

The "Art Backgrounds" category has a new effect for the first time in a while – meet the warm "Pastel Fantasy" background.

One more Halloween frame is already in "Amazing Photo Frames". Check it out!

BREAKING NEWS!

Meet the offline mode: most of our art styles from "Masterpieces" are now available with no Internet connection on iOS 11 and iOS 12. Download the effect you love to apply it offline.

Meet the offline mode! Most of our art styles from "Masterpieces" are now available with no Internet connection on iOS 11 and iOS 12. Download the effect you love to apply it offline.

And don't forget about new effects:

- "Once in Seoul" and "Animated Color Distortion" were added to the "Art backgrounds" category.
- Anticipating Halloween? Meet scary (and not) effects: "Trapped in the Fog" in "New Reality", "You-o-Lantern" in "Face Montages" and "In Beasts Hands" in "Monsters".

Have fun!

Adventurous, wild and a bit spooky Photo Lab update is about to rock your photos!

Get ready for the ‘Spaceship Adventure’ effect from ‘Realistic Photomontage’ to turn your photos into the masterpieces the whole universe would admire.
It’s time to treat yourself and trick your friends with a new Halloween avatar.

You, Halloween fans, just won’t be able to resist ‘Pumpkin Demon Makeup’.

And one of our users’ favorite category ‘Half-Human Half-Animal’ gets the new hero. Welcome ‘Scratched Out Leopard’ for your exceptional portraits.

How many new combos will you be able to create this autumn? Let’s check!

Yes, Halloween is inevitable! So you'd better be ready to rock your photos with our ever-growing collection of BOO-tiful makeovers, SPOOK-tacular frames and HORRIFYING transformations.

There are over 300 ready-to-use effects and combinations to choose from. Pick what you like or go further and create your own unique style inside the app!

ps: sharing to Snapchat is now available! ;)

All eyes are on new effects!

- Photo Lab offers you a new way to show everyone your "Inner and Outer World". Check out "New Reality" for the effect.

- If only you got a mustache... No problem! Go to "Face Photo Props" for the "Mustache me" effect.

- Halloween is not over until you try these two effects: "Makeover"'s "Hall-GLOW-een" and "A Wee Bit Wicked" in "Headwear".

- "Creme De La Creme", monsieur! A bit of romance in "Face Montages"

P.S. All our calendars are now ready for 2019 in "Amazing Frames".

Magic is all around, you just have to believe... or apply our new effects!

- Here is your "chameleon superpower"! Сhange your skin with "My Many Skins" from the "Makeover" category: upload one selfie and one picture of whatever you want (cats, mountains, sea, donuts...) and you won't be able to take your eyes off the result.

- Put yourself in a Christmas mood already now with the "Gleaming Fairy Lights" effect in the "GIF Animations" category.

Feel the magic and enjoy!

Magic is all around, you just have to believe in it... or apply our new effects:
- Here is your "chameleon superpower"! Сhange your skin with "My Many Skins" from the "Makeover" category: upload one selfie and one picture of whatever you want (cats, mountains, sea, donuts...) and you won't be able to take your eyes off the result.
- Put yourself in a Christmas mood already now with the "Gleaming Fairy Lights" effect in the "GIF Animations" category.

+ some bug were fixed in this release

Now you can easily change your skin, it's time for a new hair color: dye it whatever you want with "Any Hair Day" in the "Makeover" category.

How to find an outstanding photo effect? Elementary, Watson! Just pop in to the "New reality" category.

"Smart filters" have one new arrival - apply "Silhouette Photo Blending" to create a trendy double exposure effect.

Don't forget to add our new "Poppy Wreath" from "Headwear" to your result.

By the way, 2019 is already gleaming in "GIF Animations".

Check out new effects in the "Masterpieces" category - "On Dangerous Ground" and "Sweet Tooth". New ways to make your photos look like real pieces of art.

Waiting for Santa? Show him your love with "Ho Ho Ho Beard" from the "Face props" category.

Well, this is big!

Check out "My profile" tab and give a go to our new handy Combo Builder, which can make anyone an advanced combo creator. Mix effects, check if they really go together, rearrange or delete any at any time. Also, you can add more photos on the go.

All you need for Christmas is all that joyful, snowy, merry, and for sure amazing effects, frames, animations, ecards templates, and filters from our ultimate holiday collection.

Welcome our Christmas tab - a little wonderland inside Photo Lab that brings over 300 ideas for your Christmas photo greetings.

All you need for Christmas is all that joyful, snowy, merry, and for sure amazing effects, frames, animations, ecards templates, and filters from our ultimate holiday collection.

Welcome our Christmas tab - a little wonderland inside Photo Lab that brings over 400 ideas for your Christmas photo greetings.

Happy New ... Effects! :)

- Sometimes double exposures look so last century... Why don't you try triple for a change? It's to be found in "Smart Filters". As well as a brand-new and fancy way to combine double exposure and background change in one go.
- Volume up! And get ready to dance to four popular tunes in the "GIF animations" category.
- There are two more festive effects as well. Hope you will be on time with your glittering makeup and glittering frame.

Add a bit of retro to your photos with our new "Old Copper Penny" effect in the "Color & Lighting Filters". Apply to feel the real retro vibes!

Have you ever wanted to change your skin color like a chameleon does? Here's your chance! All you need is to try the "Color Adapting" GIF animation.

"Masterpieces" are always in demand, so please welcome our new arrivals: "Viridian" and "Rough Diamond". A real catch for your photos!

Everything changes. So does Photo Lab! We improve and develop our app every day to make you happier.

P.S. don't forget to check out new effects:

- "Romantic Gifts" in the "Simple Frames" category;
- "Flowers in My Hair" are now available in "Makeover";
- "Vacation Vibes" in "GIF Animations";
- "The Center of the Universe" was added to "Face Montages";
- Go to "Headwear" for your "Purrrfect Hat" ;
- "Lavender Blossom" is waiting for you in "Color & Lighting Filters".

Sooo good!

Love Cards tab opening!

Find the best seasonal greeting ideas with your photos in one tab.

We want Photo Lab to be your little secret tool for great photos, that's why we keep improving it 24/7. Now you know it, update and enjoy.
We don’t want to overwhelm you with technical details. All you need to know is that Photo Lab has become more reliable. Enjoy!

Still feel like your photos are missing something? This update is just for you as it brings more amazing effects for the combos that will rock the Feed.


- This filter will literally turn your world upside down. Intrigued? Try the ‘Upside Down’ effect from ‘Smart Filters’.

- Nobody expects them, that’s why photobombs are so cool. Our favorite are those with cats, so we’ve created one for you to prank your or your friends' photos. Find ‘Jumping Cat Photobomb’ in the ‘New Reality’ category.

- Space is waiting! Go to ‘Art Backgrounds’ for ‘Made of Stardust’ background.

- To add some spring mood follow the ‘Lavandula’ recipe from ‘Amazing Frames’.

- Why wait for dessert? ‘It’s Ice Cream o’Clock’ in our ‘New Reality’ category.

Like this update? Rate us or share in social media!

There are many reasons to love spring. Aren't new arrivals in Photo Lab one of them? ;)

- "Peony Heart Frame" for the most special people in your life. Find it in "Amazing Frames".
- Light struck film alike edits always reveal advanced master in you. We've added two more effects of that kind to "Smart Filters" and "Stylized Effects".
- We better not comment on the "Crow Spirit" overlay. Without any doubt, it's gonna be love at first sight.
- If simple puzzle effect is not enough, time to make a "Spiral Jigsaw Puzzle" out of your photo in "Fancy Filters".
- Do you think "Red Smokey Makeup" is for rebel souls only? At least try it on in our "Makeover" options!

Everything changes. So does Photo Lab! We improve and develop our app every day to make you happier.

P.S. "Masterpieces" are always in demand, so please welcome our new arrivals: "Hope Springs Eternal", "Tesserae", and "Living in the Moment". A real catch for your photos!

Call your fluffy friend and welcome our new category - "Photo Props for Pets"!

Enjoy different wreaths, sunglasses, hats and other effects for cats and dogs - seven templates are already available. Create combos by mixing new props & all-time best Photo Lab effects to rock the feed and let other users edit their pets' photos in the same ways.

P.S. more awesome props for pets are coming soon ;)
We want Photo Lab to be your little secret tool for great photos, that's why we keep improving it 24/7. Now you know it, update and enjoy.

Welcome new previews for all templates in the Categories tab! Starting now they come in a before-after manner, so you can check out how exactly every effect changes a photo with just a tap.

We've also added lots of new templates for your combo ideas. Apply them all and share your stunning results with us.

Stay tuned!
Everything changes. So does Photo Lab! We improve and develop our app every day to make you happier.

Breaking news! You can now use Photo Lab to change your wardrobe. Well, not exactly change, but adding an artistic touch to everything you wear is already big, right? The 'Smart Filters' category is the place to find the effects.

'Welcome to Bora Bora', 'Travelgram', 'Love My Tribe'... Those are the names of must-have arrivals for those in need of vacation. Or those who just got back from it.

Two more styles hit the PRO groups: 'Soft Monochrome' in 'Stylized Effects' and 'Scribble Lines Portrait' in 'Featured Sketches & Paintings'.
We want Photo Lab to be your little secret tool for great photos, that's why we keep improving it 24/7. Now you know it, update and enjoy.

New makeup wouldn't go amiss, huh? Hurry up for new effects in 'Makeover' and don't forget to complete your look with new 'Headwear' ;)

Transform photos into modern art with 'Pastel Aesthetic' and 'Set for Red' from 'Art Backgrounds'.

Both of our props categories - 'Photo Props' and 'Photo Props for Pets' - are ready with new arrivals.

PRO users will definitely like new 'Stylized Effects'. Go to the category for 'Butterflyfish Overlay' and 'I Hate You Then I Love You' effects.

Well, it can easily be the summer of new categories in Photo Lab. Why? Just a month ago we added a category for pets, and now we are back with two more:

- *Photo Lab EXCLUSIVE!* Nothing to wear? Turn to 'Fashionista' to try on some art and become a real trendsetter. All thanks to our brand-new AI-driven clothes detection algorithm.

- All highly-creative templates are now in 'Create from Scratch': mix your challenging ideas and our photo-editing techniques for truly unique combos.

XOXO

Heads up on new arrivals!

We simply love bokeh. And adding two more effects of this kind to "Overlays" makes it even more evident, isn't it?

A couple of new styles hit the "Makeover" group. Cheer up with our 'Mango Winged Eyeliner' or stay in tune with the world by trying the 'Map Me' skin on.

Need a special way to say 'Gimme Some Space'? Consider you have it in "Face Montages".

There are more, update and enjoy. ;)

Welcome new arrivals!

- 'Color Your Life' in 'Amazing Frames' and 'Find Yourself' in 'Simple Frames';
- Update your wardrobe with two new effects from 'Fashionista';
- Go to 'Flags' for Peru and Bosnia-Herzegovina;
- 'Pop-Art Background Changer' is waiting for your creativity in 'Customizable Effects';
- Magnificent 'Crystal Clear Curtain' from 'Stylized Effects' and mysterious 'Lace Shadows' from 'Double Exposures' are now available;
- Check out 'Photo Props' for cats, cats and cats.

Enjoy!

Let the craziness begin with 'Wacky Pops'! Check out our new category and apply over 50 crazy and funny stickers, and share them all with your friends. We bet they won't stay indifferent!

By the way, it's time for a total 'Makeover' with Photo Lab. Try a new hair color with the 'Chestnut Hair' and turn your skin into a real gold bar with the 'Skin of Gold 750' template.

P.S. don't forget to share your combos with us ;)
Everything changes. So does Photo Lab! We improve and develop our app every day to make you happier.

It's getting colder... Check out the 'Makeover' category for the warmest beard ever!

Meet Halloween arrivals in 'Monsters' and 'New Reality' categories.

Do you believe in unicorns? If so, hurry up to apply the 'Flowery Unicorn' headwear.

New 'GIF Animation' is now available. Cheers!

Welcome 'De Tout Mon Coeur' and 'Nocturnal Wonderland' - two 'Simple Photo Frames' you'll definitely like.

Hey, animal lovers! We have a new prop for your beloved pets ;)
We want Photo Lab to be your little secret tool for great photos, that's why we keep improving it 24/7. Now you know it, update and enjoy.
Everything changes. So does Photo Lab! We improve and develop our app every day to make you happier.
We want Photo Lab to be your little secret tool for great photos, that's why we keep improving it 24/7. Now you know it, update and enjoy.
We have made a few under-the-hood changes. You are unlikely to notice them, but the app stability has been improved.
New effects and bug fixes - what can be better? ;) Meet new arrivals in 'Masterpieces', 'Stylized Effects', and 'Simple Photo Frames'. Update now and enjoy.
We want Photo Lab to be your little secret tool for great photos, that's why we keep improving it 24/7. Now you know it, update and enjoy.
Everything changes. So does Photo Lab! We improve and develop our app every day to make you happier.

Everything changes. So does Photo Lab! We improve and develop our app every day to make you happier. This version includes:
- fixes for GIF-effects in Combo Builder
- general fixes for animated effects
- other minor improvements
We've made several improvements. Keep editing your photos with more stable Photo Lab.
We want Photo Lab to be your little secret tool for great photos, that's why we keep improving it 24/7. Now you know it, update and enjoy.

It's time to update your Photo Lab and check out new splendid arrivals!

- Something special is waiting for you in the 'Stylized Effects' category. Meet the 'Veil Overlay' effect!
- What about some art makeup? Apply 'Face Line Art' and 'Picassorize Me' from 'Makeover';
- Turn your photo into a mysterious picture with 'My Starry Phantom'. Find the effect in 'New Reality'.

We want Photo Lab to be your little secret tool for great photos, that's why we keep improving it 24/7.
This version solves several stability issues. You are unlikely to notice them, but Photo Lab should be running a little faster now.
Everything changes. So does Photo Lab! We improve and develop our app every day to make you happier.
We want Photo Lab to be your little secret tool for great photos, that's why we keep improving it 24/7. Now you know it, update and enjoy.
We've made several improvements. Keep editing your photos with more stable Photo Lab.
Everything changes. So does Photo Lab! We improve and develop our app every day to make you happier.

- Create your Cartoon Portraits in four unique styles driven by our new (and first-ever) AI technology
- Over 20 effects are added to other Categories. Find them all.
- We've also made several improvements so you could keep editing your photos with a more stable Photo Lab.
We want Photo Lab to be your little secret tool for great photos, that's why we keep improving it 24/7. Now you know it, update and enjoy.

We've made several improvements. Keep editing your photos with more stable Photo Lab.
We want Photo Lab to be your little secret tool for great photos, that's why we keep improving it 24/7. Now you know it, update and enjoy.

- New awesome effects
- Bug fixes and improvements
This version solves several stability issues. You are unlikely to notice them, but Photo Lab should be running a little faster now.

- We keep improving our AI Cartoon Portraits. Make sure to check full-body styles and create a combo that demonstrates your personality the best.
- New effects can be found in several groups of the Categories tab.
- Some bug fixes and performance improvements are also included.

Psst... Wanna know the "perfect combo" formula? We are ready to share it!

Toon your photo with the "AI Cartoon Portraits" effect and then choose a template you like most from our brand-new category "Figure It Out". We promise you'll love the result!

Make sure to share your awesome combos to our app's feed, we can't wait to see them!

- Important fixes and improvements
- New arrivals, including "Toon Hot To Handle" cartoon style

Halloween is closer than you think and we’ve prepared something unique for the spookiest night of the year!

Ladies and Gentlemen, please welcome our special “Halloween” tab. No more searches. All creepy, scary, bootiful, and frightening combos are gathered together in one place.

We've made several improvements. Keep editing your photos with more stable Photo Lab.

By the way, new effects are also available.

We've made several improvements. Keep editing your photos with more stable Photo Lab.

By the way, new effects are also available.

Everything changes. So does Photo Lab! We improve and develop our app every day to make you happier.

By the way, we updated calendar templates in the 'Amazing Frames' category ;)

Ready for something new? Then meet our new amazing arrivals! Update your app now and enjoy the variety of awesome filters and stunning effects.

By the way, the app should be running a bit faster with the update.
